citation: Proclamation under the Land (Miscellaneous Amendments) Act 2021 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Land (Miscellaneous Amendments) Act 2021

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Land (Miscellaneous Amendments) Act 2021 fix 1 January 2022 as the day on which the provisions of that Act commence.

13 December 2021

B. BAKER

Governor

By Her Excellency's Command,

J. PETRUSMA

Minister for Parks

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 22 December 2021

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Natural Resources and Environment Tasmania.
